Articles.Content:
Is there any news (or hope) on the problem where us Linux users cannot have HUD Ladders in any color other than black? While they're barely visible against the backdrop of the sky, they're **completely invisible** in space, or at night.

[![UqD0tBA.png](http://i.imgur.com/UqD0tBA.png)](http://imgur.com/UqD0tBA)

I spent a couple of hours on this last weekend, and I have not figured out what is going on. There is obviously something different about the way Unity's OpenGL renderer works compared to the DirectX renderer, but I haven't figured out specfically what the difference is in this case.

@MOARdv Your efforts are very much appreciated.

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> I spent a couple of hours on this last weekend, and I have not figured out what is going on. There is obviously something different about the way Unity's OpenGL renderer works compared to the DirectX renderer, but I haven't figured out specfically what the difference is in this case.

Do Windows OpenGL users have the same issue? (Question for the group)
